title: Ping problems SOLVED! check this out

replies.body: Haste is pretty good VPN that can definitely help with ping issues or simply not being able to get connected. It helps because it's able to force your connection to take a specific path to our servers, which is the problem you've been having in all your other posts. Feel free to use a vpn like this for now, but keep in mind that it's not technically the best solution in the long run. I'd still suggest reaching out to our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can figure out a long-term permanent fix for ya!
